title: Rahu Transit in the 7th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 7th house for Scorpio Ascendant, partnerships, marriage, and public dealings become intense and unconventional. This phase attracts unusual people, foreign connections, or non-traditional alliances. Desire for validation through relationships increases, which can blur boundaries or expectations. Business partnerships may grow rapidly but need transparency to last. Power dynamics and misunderstandings can surface if motives are unclear. When handled with honesty and balance, this transit expands influence through strategic collaborations and broad social reach.

sections.title: Career
points: Negotiations move fast but need clarity

sections.title: Relationships
points: Attraction to unusual or intense partners

closing: This Rahu transit magnifies partnership dynamics. With transparency and balance, it becomes a powerful phase for influence, growth, and strategic collaboration.
